title: Reading Comprehension of Indonesian Narrative Texts Using Augmented Reality-Based Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Social sector education courses for in-service practitioners to strengthen job competencies, utilizing blended learning environments with personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can identify intrinsic elements (characters, events, settings, etc.) of Indonesian narrative texts with 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze the meaning of narrative texts through AR-based digital storytelling and interpret them with over 70% accuracy
Learners can write creative responses to narrative texts in a structured format with 90% completion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
